annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.
Hamit Altintop (Darmstadt) strikes the rebound, but it goes well over the bar.
Antonio Mirko Colak (Darmstadt) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The ball is out of play. Darmstadt will have a throw in.
Antonio Mirko Colak (Darmstadt) makes a strong challenge and Wolfgang Stark blows for a foul.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 4 min. of added time.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from Dortmund.
Wolfgang Stark blows his whistle for a foul after Julian Weigl (Dortmund) hacks down one of his opponents.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Artem Fedetsky makes way for Markus Steinhofer (Darmstadt).

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 17400.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Torsten Frings has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Leon Guwara (Darmstadt) replacing Fabian Holland.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Dzenis Burnic (Dortmund) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Aytac Sulu (Darmstadt) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Marco Reus goes off the pitch and Andre Schurrle (Dortmund) comes on.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Michael Esser (Darmstadt) picks up a caution.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) brings an opponent down and Wolfgang Stark interrupts the game.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) is shown a yellow card by the referee for making a challenge on his opponent, but he looks angry with the decision.

Antonio Mirko Colak (Darmstadt) is the first to arrive to a rebound inside the penalty area and unleashes a quick strike towards the right side of the target that beats the keeper. One of the defenders, however, makes a goal line clearance.

Jerome Gondorf (Darmstadt) blew a promising chance when he got to a rebound just outside the penalty area. He struck it towards the middle of the target, but Roman Burki pulled off a nice save to stop the attempt.

What a sweet touch by Antonio Mirko Colak (Darmstadt) after latching on to a fine pass on the edge of the box! He finds some space and unleashes a cannonball towards the roof of the net. The goalkeeper makes a brilliant save, pushing the ball onto the post.
Erik Durm (Dortmund) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Michael Esser, who smothers the ball.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by Marco Reus (Dortmund).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Sidney Sam plays in Antonio Mirko Colak (Darmstadt), who shows great determination to get to the ball before a couple of defenders and from inside the box slots it into the bottom left corner 2:1.
A pass by Artem Fedetsky (Darmstadt) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end. The ball goes out of play and Dortmund will have a goal kick.
Christian Pulisic (Dortmund) commits a rough challenge and Wolfgang Stark blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here comes a substitution. Emre Mor is given a rest as he is replaced by Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Thomas Tuchel prepares a substitution. Raphael Guerreiro is replaced by Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund).

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: The actual number of corner kicks in this match – 0:12.
An accurate pass to the edge of the box is well taken by Jan Rosenthal (Darmstadt), whose instinctive shot towards goal flashes inches wide of the left post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Antonio Mirko Colak (Darmstadt) replaces Terrance Boyd.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) is penalised for holding. Wolfgang Stark signals a set piece.
Dortmund are playing excellent possession football at the moment by exchanging some long passes.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.
Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.
Great chance! Jan Rosenthal (Darmstadt) collects a great pass inside the box, but the goalkeeper does well to stop his effort.
Dortmund enjoy a period of possession as they are exchanging some passes and waiting for an opportunity to strike.
Wolfgang Stark blows his whistle after Fabian Holland (Darmstadt) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for half time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 1 min. of added time.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) gets to the ball on the edge of the box and fires in a first time shot without any hesitation. The strike is excellent and goes inside the left post. He couldn't have done it any better. 1:1.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.

It's unbelievable, Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) blows a huge opportunity! He is totally unmarked and fires a first time shot towards the roof of the net, but Michael Esser reacts superbly to keep the ball out. Dortmund force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.
Emre Mor (Dortmund) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger.
Marcel Heller (Darmstadt) receives a pass and decides to smash the ball from long range, but his poor effort sails high over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) takes the corner which is cleared. Dortmund will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) takes the resulting free kick from the edge of the box. His rocket of a shot crashes against the crossbar! What a shot.
The linesman raises his flag. Marcel Heller (Darmstadt) is adjudged offside.
Darmstadt seem to be finding their feet as they enjoy some possession. They are waiting for the right moment to create new attacking opportunities.
Wolfgang Stark has a clear sight and sees a foul from Marco Reus (Dortmund).

Marco Reus (Dortmund) goes on a mazy run, skips past two defenders and pulls the trigger in front of the keeper. Michael Esser makes a great save to stop the effort going into the bottom right corner.
A pass by Sidney Sam (Darmstadt) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Terrance Boyd (Darmstadt) gets on the end of a brilliant pass and scores a great goal after finding the back of the net by striking the ball past the goalkeeper!
Erik Durm (Dortmund) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
The linesman signals that Terrance Boyd (Darmstadt) is offside and the referee confirms the decision.
Emre Mor (Dortmund) was too fierce in his attempt to get the ball from his opponent and Wolfgang Stark blows for a foul.
Nice passing game by Dortmund. They are increasing their possession with a series of long passes and waiting for the right moment to create an attacking opportunity.
Good clearance! Jan Rosenthal (Darmstadt) receives a brilliant short pass and finds himself in a good position inside the box, but he's robbed of the ball by one of the defending players.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) commits a minor foul to interrupt the attacking move of his opponent and is warned by the referee that he will get a yellow card if he does it again.
Sidney Sam (Darmstadt) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
Emre Mor (Dortmund) sends a cross into the box, but Michael Esser comes off his line to gather the ball.
Artem Fedetsky (Darmstadt) did his best to latch on to a crossfield pass, but it was too long and it goes out of play.
What a chance that is! Jan Rosenthal (Darmstadt) wastes a huge opportunity as he receives a beautiful pass inside the box but is somehow only able to prod the ball onto the right post!
Marco Reus (Dortmund) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner, taken by Marco Reus (Dortmund), comes to nothing.
Jan Rosenthal (Darmstadt) latches on to a cross from the free kick and attempts to direct a bullet header into the top of the net. Roman Burki is alert, though, and makes a great save to deny him.
Matthias Ginter (Dortmund) was too forceful with his tackle and Wolfgang Stark interrupted the game to signal a free kick.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) trips an opposition player and Wolfgang Stark signals a foul.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) clearly holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee immediately stops play.
Dortmund control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half of this match is about to start.
Dortmund will kick off.
Wolfgang Stark will supervise the game today.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: Before the start of the game, you can see the starting lineups for today's clash.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.
Dortmund have not tasted defeat in their last 7 games.
12:38 That's the goals for and against record for Darmstadt. They need some improvement in the defence.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.
